scripts.re_install: yarn && cd ios && pod install && yarn run iphone_se_start
scripts.remove: rm -rf node_modules && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf build && rm -rf Podfile.lock && cd .. && yarn run re_install
scripts.android-debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleDebug && open app/build/outputs/apk/
scripts.android-release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
